logoPlaceholder.title: Starbucks Logo Placeholder
logoPlaceholder.description: An abstract representation of the Starbucks Siren integrated with the brand's initials.
logoPlaceholder.rationale: To create a simple and recognizable representation of the brand, while incorporating a modern twist with clean typography.

brandVoiceDescription: The brand voice is friendly, premium, welcoming, relaxed, and uplifting, reflecting the brand's values of warmth, community, sustainability, craftsmanship, and consistency.

socialMockups.description: Showcasing expertly crafted beverages and inviting community moments.
Highlighting the brand's commitment to sustainability and social responsibility.
Sharing behind-the-scenes stories of the brand's craftsmanship and dedication to quality.

collateralMockups.description: Showcasing a simple, modern design that highlights the brand's logo and contact information.
Highlighting the brand's offerings, values, and community focus through high-quality imagery and clear typography.
Displaying the brand's menu offerings in a clear, easy-to-read format that showcases the brand's attention to detail.

websiteHeaderDescription: A modern, responsive design that showcases the brand's offerings, values, and community focus through high-quality imagery and clear typography, while providing a seamless user experience.

recommendedChannels.reason: Ideal for showcasing the brand's visually appealing beverages and inviting community moments.
Suitable for sharing the brand's commitment to sustainability and social responsibility through engaging content.
Perfect for sharing behind-the-scenes stories of the brand's craftsmanship and dedication to quality.

campaignDirections.title: Sustainability Focused Campaign
campaignDirections.concept: Highlighting the brand's commitment to environmentally friendly practices and sourcing.
campaignDirections.suggestedVisuals: Greenery, eco-friendly packaging, and minimal waste visuals

campaignDirections.title: Craftsmanship Showcase Campaign
campaignDirections.concept: Showcasing the expertise and dedication of the brand's baristas and roasters.
campaignDirections.suggestedVisuals: Behind-the-scenes footage, in-depth brewing processes, and expertly crafted beverages

campaignDirections.title: Community Building Campaign
campaignDirections.concept: Focusing on the brand's role as a third place between home and work, highlighting community moments and events.
campaignDirections.suggestedVisuals: Cozy caf√© atmosphere, group gatherings, and community-driven events
